title: Historical work backfill (v0.1)
description: Capture recently completed repository work in Beads so historical context is queryable.
design: Represent delivered capabilities as closed feature/task beads linked to commit context.
acceptance_criteria: Major completed workstreams from recent history are represented as closed beads.

title: Install and distribution improvements
description: Completed work to improve install UX and release distribution artifacts.
acceptance_criteria: Historical tasks for installer behavior and release delivery are recorded.

title: Cross-platform installer with release fallback
description: Added install script logic to detect platform and fetch matching release binaries with source fallback.

title: Install binary to /usr/local/bin
description: Adjusted installer destination from ~/.cargo/bin to /usr/local/bin.

title: Auto-add cargo bin path in shell profile
description: Installer updates shell profile so cargo bin path is available after setup.

title: Tree rendering and performance stabilization
description: Completed rendering correctness and speed improvements in tree navigation and drawing.
acceptance_criteria: Historical tasks for render API fixes, viewport scroll logic, and perf work are recorded.

title: Remove per-frame allocations and redundant IO
description: Optimized runtime by reducing repetitive allocations and unnecessary filesystem work in hot paths.

title: Manual tree renderer with viewport tracking
description: Implemented manual tree rendering path to keep scrolling and selection behavior accurate.

title: Tree rendering integration tests
description: Added integration coverage to guard tree guide rendering and viewport behavior.

title: Preview and update reliability improvements
description: Completed work improving preview correctness and update-notice behavior.
acceptance_criteria: Historical tasks for update checks and preview safety are recorded.

title: Background update check on startup
description: Added asynchronous startup check for new upstream commit availability.

title: Clear preview pane when switching selection
description: Fixed stale preview content when moving from files to directories or shorter content.

title: Binary preview rejection and control-char sanitization
description: Hardened preview path by rejecting binary data and sanitizing unsafe control characters.

title: v0.2 roadmap backfill
description: Populate Beads with a concrete roadmap based on the current repository state after adopting bd.
design: Track work in four streams: docs consistency, architecture, reliability, and CI quality gates.
acceptance_criteria: Feature beads exist for each stream with task-level children and key dependencies.

title: Align docs and release metadata
description: Fix drift between docs/release text and the current install + artifact behavior.
design: Audit README + release workflow body and update statements to match shipped behavior.
acceptance_criteria: README and release metadata describe install location and platform artifacts accurately.

title: Fix release body install path text
description: Release workflow body still references ~/.cargo/bin even though install path was moved to /usr/local/bin.
acceptance_criteria: Release notes install section matches actual install target and behavior.

title: Update README platform artifact claims
description: README currently implies limited prebuilt coverage while release workflow builds a broader matrix.
acceptance_criteria: README platform/binary statements match current release artifacts.

title: Modularize core app structure
description: Reduce monolithic complexity in src/main.rs by introducing focused modules.
design: Extract filesystem helpers, update checker, render logic, and model update/view logic into modules.
acceptance_criteria: Core responsibilities are split into modules with unchanged behavior and passing tests.

title: Split src/main.rs into focused modules
description: Current single-file layout is large and mixes state, rendering, IO, and tests.
acceptance_criteria: Main file is decomposed into modules with clear ownership boundaries.

title: Reorganize tests after modularization
description: Existing tests should be moved/reshaped to match extracted modules without reducing coverage intent.
acceptance_criteria: Tests are organized with module boundaries and still pass.
notes: Blocked by file-browser-enu.2.1 (module split must land first).

title: Harden update + preview reliability
description: Improve robustness of update checking and file preview edge-case handling.
design: Replace brittle parsing and dependency assumptions; add tests for failure paths.
acceptance_criteria: Update check handles malformed responses/network failures safely and preview edge cases are covered by tests.

title: Use robust commit SHA parsing for update check
description: Update checker currently extracts sha from JSON via string slicing, which is brittle.
acceptance_criteria: Commit SHA extraction is resilient to JSON formatting changes and malformed payloads.

title: Remove hard dependency on curl for update checks
description: Update check shells out to curl; improve portability and failure isolation.
acceptance_criteria: Update checker works without requiring external curl binary, or cleanly degrades with explicit fallback.
notes: Blocked by file-browser-enu.3.1 (robust SHA parsing precedes transport change).

title: Add continuous integration quality gates
description: Introduce CI checks for formatting, linting, and tests on push/PR.
design: Add a dedicated CI workflow for cargo fmt, clippy, and test; keep release workflow separate.
acceptance_criteria: PRs/pushes run quality checks automatically and failures are visible in GitHub Actions.

title: Add CI workflow for fmt clippy test
description: Repository has release automation but lacks routine CI checks for day-to-day changes.
acceptance_criteria: GitHub workflow runs cargo fmt --check, clippy, and test for push/PR.

title: Document CI expectations in contributor docs
description: Contributors should know which checks run in CI and how to run them locally.
acceptance_criteria: Docs include CI checklist and local command equivalents.
notes: Blocked by file-browser-enu.4.1 (CI workflow must exist before docs update).
